DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine weather well trained athlete benefit inspiratory ( respiratory ) muscle training .
DOC.detailed_description: - Subject : The investigator intend include 40 well trained runner , 18 year old . - Design : Following lung function exercise testing ( incremental treadmill test exhaustion , 5000m run time trial ) participant randomly assign verum control group . The verum group train hand-held , commercially available pressure threshold loading device ( POWERbreathe , UK ) . The control group perform sham-training device . After six eight week initial test repeat . - Hypothesis : Inspiratory muscle training enhances performance submaximal work load 5000m run time trial change breathe pattern . Maximum oxygen uptake remain unchanged .
DOC.criteria: well trained runner previous respiratory muscle training cardiovascular disease impair lung function
